nodes.text: Raidah Doon was a female individual who was an athlete and former Stormsailer champion. Doon was the wife of the New Republic pilot Wesson Dove. Doon and her wife later joined the Resistance and participated on a mission to the planet Bracca.
Raidah Doon first appeared in the 2019 novel Resistance Reborn, written by Rebecca Roanhorse.
